verses.verse: {The Light of God's Deliverance} d "Arise, shine! For your light has come; the {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT LXX read and the glory} glory of the Lord has risen upon you.
For look! Darkness will cover the earth and thick darkness is over the people, {Lit. peoples} but the Lord will arise upon you, and his glory will appear over you.
Nations will come to your light, and kings before {So 1QIsa a ; MT reads kings to the brightness of ; cf. LXX} your dawn.
"Lift up your eyes and look around: They all gather together, they come to you; your sons will come from far away, and your daughters will be carried on the hip." {Or arm}

Then you will look and be radiant; your heart will swell with joy, {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT read will throb and swell with joy LXX reads you will be amazed in your heart} because the abundance of the seas will be diverted to you, and the riches of the nations will come to you.

Throngs of camels will blanket you: the young camels of Midian and Ephu; {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT read Ephah} all those from Shebu {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT read Sheba} will come. They'll carry gold and frankincense, and proclaim the praise of the Lord .

All Kedar's flocks will be gathered to you, the rams of Nebaioth will serve you. and {So 1QIsa a LXX; 1QIsa b MT lack and} they'll come up with acceptance upon {So 1QIsa a cf. LXX; 1QIsa b MT read upon the acceptance of} my altar, and I'll glorify my glorious house."
{The Future Restoration of Zion} d "Who are these that fly like clouds, and like doves to their windows? {I. e. dovecotes , cages in which pet doves are housed}

For the coastlands will look to me, with the ships of Tarshish in the lead, to bring my {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT LXX read your} children from far away, their silver and gold with them, to the name of the Lord your God, and to the Holy One of Israel, because he has glorified you.
"Foreigners will rebuild your walls, and their kings will serve you. Though in my anger I struck you down, in my favor I have shown you mercy.
Your gates will always stand open by day or night, and {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT LXX lack and} they will not be shut, so that nations will bring you their wealth, with their kings led in procession.
For the nation or kingdom that will not serve you will perish; those nations will be utterly ruined.

"He has given you {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT LXX lack He has given you} the glory of Lebanon, and it will come {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT LXX read Lebanon will come} to you, the cypress, and {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT lack and} the plane tree, {i. e. a species of trees that could readily be stripped of their bark; cf. Gen 30:37} and the pine, to adorn the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.

"All {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT LXX lack All} the descendants of those who oppressed you will come bending low before you, and all those who despised you will bow down at your feet. They'll call you «The City of the Lord ,'«Zion of the Holy One of Israel.»"
{Israel: the Joy of Generations} d "Although you have been forsaken and despised, with no one traveling through, I will make you the everlasting pride, the joy of all generations.
You'll suck the milk of nations, You'll suck the breasts of kings. Then you will realize that I, the Lord , am your Savior and your Redeemer, the Mighty One of Jacob.

"Instead of bronze, I'll bring gold, and instead of iron, I'll bring silver; instead of wood, bronze, and instead of stones, iron. I'll appoint peace as your supervisor and righteousness as your taskmaster.

Then {So 1QIsa a LXX; 1QIsa b MT lack Then} violence will no longer be heard in your land, nor devastation or destruction within your borders; but you'll call your walls «Salvation', and your gates «Praise'.

"The sun will no longer be your light by day, nor for brightness will the moon shine on you by night {So 1QIsa a LXX. Not in 1QIsa b MT} for the Lord will be your everlasting light, {1QIsa b lacks and your God light ; 1QIsa a MT LXX contain the longer reading} and your God will be your glory.
Your sun won't {So 1QIsa a LXX; MT reads will no longer} set, nor will your moon withdraw itself for the Lord will be your everlasting light, and your days of mourning will end.

Then your people will all be righteous; They'll possess the land forever. They are the shoot {So 1QIsa a 4QIsa m MT; 1QIsa a MT ms lacks the shoot ; LXX reads Guarding} that the Lord planted, {Lit. of the plantings of the Lord ; so 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b reads of his plantings MT reads of his planting MT qere reads of my planting LXX reads the planting} the works {So 1QIsa a ; 1QIsa b MT read work} of his hands, so that I might be glorified.
The least of them will become a thousand, and the smallest one a mighty nation. "I am the Lord ; When the time is right, {Lit. In its time} I will do this swiftly."
